FLOOD ADVISORY
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE NORTH PLATTE NE
836 AM CST TUE DEC 30 2014

NEC111-011900-
/O.CON.KLBF.FA.Y.0029.000000T0000Z-150101T1900Z/
/00000.N.IJ.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/
LINCOLN NE-
836 AM CST TUE DEC 30 2014

...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR ICE JAM FLOODING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR CENTRAL
LINCOLN COUNTY UNTIL 100 PM CST THURSDAY...

MINOR FLOODING CONTINUES ALONG THE SOUTH PLATTE RIVER EAST OF NORTH 
PLATTE IN THE VICINITY OF THE IRON EAGLE GOLF COURSE. AT THIS 
TIME...ONLY MINOR FLOODING OF AREAS ALONG THE RIVER IS OCCURRING AND 
THE SAME IS EXPECTED GOING THROUGH THE WEEK.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

DO NOT DRIVE YOUR VEHICLE INTO AREAS WHERE WATER COVERS THE ROADWAY. 
THE WATER DEPTH MAY BE TOO GREAT TO ALLOW YOUR CAR TO CROSS SAFELY.

&&

LAT...LON 4112 10059 4103 10060 4104 10075 4113 10074

$$
